query:
SELECT 
  'Training Modules' as content_type,
  COUNT(*) as total_count
FROM training_modules
UNION ALL
SELECT 
  'Course Lessons' as content_type,
  COUNT(*) as total_count
FROM course_lessons
UNION ALL
SELECT 
  'Lesson Quizzes' as content_type,
  COUNT(*) as total_count
FROM lesson_quizzes
